```{r include=FALSE}
library(raster)
library(maps)
library(ggmap)
library(usmap)
library(ggplot2)
library(scales)
library(ggsn)
```


```{r}
#dput(dat)
Longitude = c(-90.3734, -87.3708, -84.0730, -100.5129, -89.3804, -82.1833)
Latitude = c(35.0951, 39.7928, 42.6606, 41.4803, 43.3380, 42.5896)
Location <- c("Proctor, AR", "Montezuma, IN", "Fowlerville, MI", "Stapleton, NE", "Arlington, WI", "Dresden, ON")
dat <- data.frame(Location, Latitude, Longitude)
```


```{r}
states <- c("Alabama", "Arizona",  "Arkansas",  "California", "Colorado",  "Connecticut",  "Delaware",  "Florida", "Georgia", "Idaho", "Illinois", "Indiana",  "Iowa",  "Kansas", "Kentucky", "Louisiana", "Maine", "Maryland", "Massachusetts", "Michigan", "Minnesota",  "Mississippi", "Missouri", "Montana", "Nebraska", "Nevada", "New Hampshire", "New Jersey", "New Mexico", "New York", "North Carolina", "North Dakota", "Ohio", "Oklahoma", "Oregon", "Pennsylvania", "Rhode Island", "South Carolina", "South Dakota", "Tennessee", "Texas", "Utah", "Vermont", "Virginia", "Washington", "West Virginia", "Wisconsin", "Wyoming")

provinces <- c("Alberta" ,"British Columbia", "Manitoba", "New Brunswick", "Newfoundland and Labrador", "Nova Scotia", "Ontario", "Prince Edward Island", "Saskatchewan", "QuÃ©bec")
us <- getData("GADM",country="USA",level=1)
canada <- getData("GADM",country="CAN",level=1)
us.states <- us[us$NAME_1 %in% states,]
ca.provinces <- canada[canada$NAME_1 %in% provinces,]
```





```{r}
ggplot(us.states, aes(x=long, y=lat, group=group))+
    geom_path(fill = "white", color = "grey50") +
    geom_path(data=ca.provinces, fill = "white", color = "grey50") +
    #coord_map() + 
   theme_bw() +
    geom_point(data = dat, aes(x=Longitude,y=Latitude, group=Location, color=Location)) + 
  scale_color_manual(values = c("red", "blue", "darkgreen", "black",  "orange", "darkviolet")) +
    labs(x = "", y = "") +
    theme(axis.text = element_text(size = 13, color="black"), 
          legend.position = c(0.85, 0.2),
          legend.title = element_blank(),
          panel.background = element_blank(),
          panel.grid = element_blank(),
          legend.text = element_text(size=13),
          axis.title = element_text(size = 15, color="black")) +
  ggsave("Map.tiff", dpi=300, width=9, height=5)
```



















```{r include=FALSE}
state = map_data("usmap")
df <- subset(state, region %in% c("wisconsin", "nebraska", "arkansas", "michigan", "indiana", "ontario"))
```

```{r include=FALSE}
counties <- map_data("county")
midwest <- subset(counties, region %in% c("wisconsin", "nebraska", "arkansas", "michigan", "indiana", "ontario"))
```

```{r}
ggplot(data = df, mapping = aes(x = long, y = lat, group = group, color=region)) +
  geom_polygon(data = midwest, fill = "NA", color = "gray") +
  geom_polygon(color = "black", fill = NA) + scale_color_brewer(palette=c("Set1")) +
  labs(fill="", y="", x="", caption="") 
```
